title: Health and the human mind
description: Listen closely -- Marvin Minsky's arch, eclectic, charmingly offhand talk on health, overpopulation and the human mind is packed with subtlety: wit, wisdom and just an ounce of wily, is-he-joking? advice.
author: Marvin Minsky
keywords: TED, talks, brain, health, humanity, humor, science, technology, psychology, evolutionary psychology
